actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for retired magistrates to be recalled to service and to provide a retirement system for United States magistrates equal to the retirement system for bankruptcy.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to permit retired United States magistrates to be recalled by the judicial conference to serve in any judicial district. Provides a retirement system for United States magistrates.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for retired magistrates to be recalled to service and to provide a retirement system for United States magistrates equal to the retirement system for bankruptcy.
